title: Aliens
creator_credit: Brandywine Productions, SLM Production Group, 20th Century Fox, David Giler, Gale Anne Hurd, James Cameron, Peter Lamont, Walter Hill and Emma Porteous
headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1986
brief_description: When Ripley’s lifepod is found by a salvage crew over 50 years later, she finds that terra-formers are on the very planet they found the alien species. When the company sends a family of colonists out to investigate her story—all contact is lost with the planet and colonists. They enlist Ripley and the colonial marines to return and search for answers.

constellations_other.name: Go Bang
constellations_other.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.
